narrator.name: Island Spirit
narrator.description: The mysterious voice that guides treasure hunters on their quest
narrator.personality: Wise, mysterious, encouraging but warns of danger
catchphrases: The island remembers all who seek its treasures...
Time flows like the tide - swift and unforgiving...
Choose wisely, for the pirates draw near...
The spirits of old pirates whisper their secrets...

pirate_captain.name: Captain Redbeard
pirate_captain.description: The ruthless pirate captain hunting for the same treasure
dialogue: Ye can't hide from me forever, treasure hunter!
That gold belongs to the brotherhood of the sea!
I'll find ye and that treasure, mark me words!

ghost_pirate.name: Captain Blackbeard's Ghost
ghost_pirate.description: The spirit of the legendary pirate who hid the treasure
ghost_pirate.personality: Protective of treasure, tests worthiness of seekers
dialogue: Only the worthy may claim me treasure...
Prove yerself brave and clever, or face the curse!
